title: Mr.Green
author: Birch
content:
I had a dream
where the corduroy grew like grass.
The earth, dust and breeze
all came for me.

Then I fell and eyes were closed
but saw all the ultimate
like a child drawing with a melt spring.

West wind brought in
while the east took it away.
Left the colors with illusion.
